Texts.Eng: I knew Barnos would get the job done! Let me just assemble everything... Here you go: your fully restored Excalibur-class shieldblade!

^green;You should head back to ^orange;Hadaeko^reset;, she'll want to have that Shard so you can finish your little project. Make sure to show me the weapon once it's finished - I'd love to see a true Excalibur-class shieldblade!
